attributes.action: Make a legal limit on the Volume of personal music players
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already know that listing to mp3 players and the like can cause permanent damage to a users hearing, but additionally the irritation that these devices cause to people in the surroundings needs to be considered. Many times commuting journeys have been made quite stressful by a follow passenger having his music player as loud as it can go. I would therefore request that a law is passed to limit these devices to a volume which is safe for the owner, and not disturbing to those around them.
